attribute.description: HTML: The direction of text display, either 'ltr' (left-to-right) or 'rtl' (right-to-left).
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "ERROR".
attribute.name: errorClass

attribute.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "ERROR".
attribute.name: errorStyle

attribute.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "FATAL".
attribute.name: fatalClass

attribute.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "FATAL".
attribute.name: fatalStyle

attribute.description: The ID of the component whose attached FacesMessage object (if present) should be diplayed by this component. It takes precedence over globalOnly.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: Specifies whether only messages (FacesMessage objects) not associated with a specific component should be displayed, ie whether messages should be ignored if they are attached to a particular component. Defaults to false.
attribute.name: globalOnly

attribute.description: Get a string which uniquely identifies this UIComponent within the scope of the nearest ancestor NamingContainer component. The id is not necessarily unique across all components in the current view.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "INFO".
attribute.name: infoClass

attribute.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "INFO".
attribute.name: infoStyle

attribute.description: A boolean value that indicates whether this component should be rendered. Default value: true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Specifies whether the detailed information from the message should be shown. Default to false.
attribute.name: showDetail

attribute.description: Specifies whether the summary information from the message should be shown. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: showSummary

attribute.description: HTML: CSS styling instructions.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: The CSS class for this element. Corresponds to the HTML 'class' attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: If true, the message summary will be rendered as a tooltip (i.e. HTML title attribute).
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: The text of the tooltip.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown and hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelay

attribute.description: The tooltip is hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayHide

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayShow

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip to be displayed? Possible values: "top", "bottom", "right", "left", "auto", "auto top", "auto bottom", "auto right" and "auto left". Default to "bottom".
attribute.name: tooltipPosition

attribute.description: CSS class to be used for messages with severity "WARN".
attribute.name: warnClass

attribute.description: CSS style to be used for messages with severity "WARN".
attribute.name: warnStyle
